page.title: 15Farming at Brightwalton
page.content: There are 4 farms in our area. They cover about{2940 acres}with woods. {Manor Farm Brightwalton}has 1073 acres{Manor Farm Chaddleworth}has 800 {Woolley Home Farm}1050 acres and{Malt- {house Farm}about 10.On all the farms the{crops}are done on a{rotational } basis.They consist of:{Winter wheat, {barley,oilseed rape,and oats.}Some {maize}is grown for{cover for game {birds}bred for shooting.There is some {permenant pasture}and land used for {grass for silage.Livestock}includes {sheep,Ayrshire and Friesian dairy {Ayrshire x limousin and Charolais beef {cattle,some horses,goats and donkeys. {Poultry}includes{ducks geese}and {chickens. Machinery}is of some{160 {implements}with{26 tractors,combines, {cultivators, muck and ferti-spreaders {ploughs harvesters, bailers,trailors {sprayers harrows}and so on.
